review: We do not have a SmartTV so the Amazon FireStick is a perfect fix for that! We love to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime shows and music.  I refuse to pay for cable tv so this is a great way to stay entertained without!! We love it and I want to buy one for every room in the house!
author: brittany

review: Are you sick of cable? I know I was. So annoyed with the outages, charges... basically everything about it! So... I decided to get the Amazon Fire TV Stick and boy did my life change! This has been a great product to keep my TV and Movie watching to it's fullest! You get access to Prime TV, Netflix, Plex etc etc etc. There are so many options, AND if you're just bored, play a game on it! WHAT?? So amazing. Buy this asap!
